channel.title: DDS-Speced * want to make Arma Spec higher Hits *
channel.description:
Hello!,
How to make when you do with ''Armadyl Godsword Special attack, you hits 70's?''
Wich bonuses i need to add for it?.
Thanks. I D D S I

item.title: DDS-Speced * want to make Arma Spec higher Hits *
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

id say search for the spec void (if its in a void if not the spec where it takes away spec) and change specdamage or whatever it calls it in your source

Read full topic

item.title: DDS-Speced * want to make Arma Spec higher Hits *
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:4, topic:246091”][quote author=I D D S I link=topic=322563.msg2549351#msg2549351 date=1227430212]

Just add higher bonuses, don’t think we have a number

so just the str bonus, like 330?
[/quote]
I’d say all bonuses, not just the str[/quote]

okay, thanks.

Read full topic
